name: MEMessageActionHandler
desc: An object that performs actions on messages as the system downloads them.

items.name: func decideAction(for: MEMessage, completionHandler: (MEMessageActionDecision?) -> Void)
items.desc: Determines the action that the system takes when it downloads a message.

items.name: class MEMessageAction
items.desc: An action the system performs on a message, such as setting a color or archiving it.

items.name: class MEMessageActionDecision
items.desc: The action that the system performs on a message, or a request to ask the action handler again later when the message content is available.

items.name: enum MEMessageAction.MessageColor
items.desc: A color that the system uses to display a message in the message list.
